description: The 'LsaRegisterLogonProcess' function verifies that the application making the function call is a logon process by checking that it has the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set. Possible Rubeus tries to get a handle to LSA. Author: Roberto Rodriguez (source), Ilyas Ochkov (rule), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: User Couldn't Call a Privileged Service 'LsaRegisterLogonProcess'
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing" AND winlog.event_id:"4673" AND Service:"LsaRegisterLogonProcess\(\)" AND Keywords:"0x8010000000000000")
